result.eng: It is always difficult to enter new markets.
result.ga: Bíonn sé deacair dul isteach i margaí nua
result.orig: Bíonn sé deacair dul isteach i margaí nua
result.html: Bíonn sé deacair dul isteach i margaí nuaIt is always difficult to enter new markets.
result.ponchtml: Bíonn sé deacair dul isteaċ i margaí nuaIt is always difficult to enter new markets.

result.eng: Of course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
result.ga: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe
result.orig: Ar ndóigh ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a bhí na trádálaithe

result.ponchtml: Ar ndóiġ ba ag freastal ar na margaí siúcra agus éadaí ar ais san Eoraip a ḃí na trádálaiṫeOf course, the traders were serving the sugar and clothes markets back in Europe.
